dataset_description.Name:
EEG: Electrophysiological biomarkers of behavioral dimensions 
from cross-species paradigms

readme_content: Three different tasks.   From: "Electrophysiological biomarkers of behavioral dimensions from cross-species paradigms"   N=57 humans.   Also has mouse data in code folder.   Triggers were odd binary recombinations that were re-translated into 0-255 in Matlab.   See .m scripts and Trigger Translator.xlsData collected circa 2014-2016 in San Diego.  Data analyzed circa 2015-2021 in New Mexico.   - James F Cavanagh 04/19/2021
